name: Ж
description: While this area is just beginning to develop and it is difficult to give accurate predictions. My husband, as a game industry worker, expects NFT to appear in games that accept tokenized artifacts. The game artifact will then become one of a kind. I'm still of the opinion in this discussion that there will be a place for digital art too. And in five years, the sale of such content will be the same norm as microstock and print shops are now. I hope in your project you can tell a little bit about how it all works, because so far it's something rather abstract for me :) nevertheless it would be very interesting to participate, especially since I deal mostly with vintage letters. And the combination of past and future seems to me to be a great idea!
